body: You've always found yourself in positions where others look up to you as a leader, and you can distinctly remember an event from your early childhood where you led several other children to accomplish a goal that each of you individually could not. All cohorts, followers, or summoned creatures under your leadership gain a +1 morale bonus on Will saves to avoid mind-affecting effects. If you ever take the Leadership feat, you gain a +1 trait bonus to your Leadership score.
name: Natural-Born Leader
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Basic Traits/Social Traits/Natural-Born Leader
